third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Expects a war with no clear domination from either side. Believes Denis is stronger in arm power but Devon has better hand-wrist coordination and experience.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Denis's power vs Devon's technique and endurance

Devon Larratt.health: Good, but endurance questioned by some
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Recent matches show adaptability but some struggles against committed dead wrist press

Denis Cyplenkov.health: In phenomenal shape, leaner than prime
Denis Cyplenkov.previous_match_summary: Less active recently but focused solely on this match

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Sees Ongarbaev as the favorite but Todd has more than a puncher's chance. Expects a tough match with potential for either to stop the other.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: Todd's side pressure vs Ongarbaev's top roll

Todd Hutchings.previous_match_summary: Known for big wins against top rollers

Kydyrgali Ongarbaev.strength: Pound for pound best pure arm wrestler, smooth rotation

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: John is the favorite but not by a large margin. Expects a close match with John's hydraulic pronation being a key factor.
third_party_predictions.style_conflict: John's pronation vs Sasho's side pressure

Sasho Andreev.strength: Strong side pressure, young and at physical peak
Sasho Andreev.previous_match_summary: Technically strong but less experienced than John

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Hard to predict. Irakli's pronation vs Rustam's down pressure. Rustam may have an edge if he can contain Irakli's top roll.

Irakli Zirakashvili.strength: Elite top roller, clean back pressure
